name: 2202 CANON DODGE
description:
Avoid canons and collect gems to win!

Collect 18 Gems to win 20% Discount that can be applied on the 2202 store.

Collect 20 Gems to win the game, receive 20% discount and unlock the bonus level!

Any prizes won must be claimed through our Instagram page. 

HOW TO CLAIM

1. Take a clear screenshot of the prize or/ and discount code given.

2. Send us a message on Instagram or contact us via email at ; salesteam@2202.store with the valid screenshot. 

3. Get an official code within 24hrs that can be applied on the 2202 store.  

That's it!

Goodluck, YOU GOT THIS.

@2202igt
